name: Senior Hearts
description:
In Senior Hearts, an empathy game for senior dogs, you play as a caretaker to a senior dog rescue where you learn the lifestyle and challenges presented to these forgotten old souls by conversing with and assisting these elderly dogs. 

Senior Hearts is a student game created at the University of Utah in under one semester by:

Anthony Palerino - engineer

Ray Parker - engineer

Cameron Rivard - artist

Jess Harley - artist

Although those were our main roles, given how small the group is, each of touched many aspects of the project.   

-created in Gamemaker Studio 2
